title: Estimate Offshore Platform Decommissioning Costs
description: An engineer creates a cost estimate for the future decommissioning of an offshore platform, as required for financial reporting.

tasks.description: Gather all technical data for the platform, including its weight, number of wells, and water depth.
tasks.expected_outcome: All necessary input data for the cost model is collected.

tasks.description: Use a cost estimation model to calculate the costs for well abandonment, topside removal, and jacket removal.
tasks.expected_outcome: The model provides a detailed breakdown of decommissioning costs.

tasks.description: Generate an Asset Retirement Obligation (ARO) report for the finance department.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal report detailing the estimated future liability is created.
